title: Restore your Celo Wallet
userYourBackupKey: Already have a Celo Wallet? Enter your Backup Key to restore it to this phone.
backupKeyTip: Backup Keys are 24 words long, separated by a space.
socialImportInfo: If you enabled Safeguards, you sent Safeguard Phrases to two friends. Please retrieve these phrases and enter them here (in any order) to regain access to your funds.
socialTip: Phrases are lists of 13 words separated by spaces.
